name: Conectoma
description:
CONECTOMA is composed by three graphic stories (comics) and an interactive story. 

The four stories are connected through the company of which the first is entitled: A PERFECT WORLD CO.

A PERFECT WORLD CO. is dedicated to the research and development of technologies related to the brain and artificial intelligence. These stories explore the consequences of such technologies on people.

These technologies may be closer or farther from our reach, but I have no doubt that someday they will be possible.
